attributes.action: bring in compulsory voting and put "Non of the above" on the ballot
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government has no mandate, less than 50% of the population voted and less than 50% of those that did voted for this government. They have no mandate to run this country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
